subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Blake Griffin led Oklahoma to victory by making 11 of his 12 shots and scoring 28 points, and immediately got up after a Morgan State player flipped him over his back.
snippet: Blake Griffin led Oklahoma to victory by making 11 of his 12 shots and scoring 28 points, and immediately got up after a Morgan State player flipped him over his back.
